original_text: Therefore put on the full armor of God, so that when the day of evil comes, you may be able to stand your ground, and after you have done everything, to stand.
korean_text: 그러므로 하나님의 전신 갑주를 취하라 이는 악한 날에 너희가 능히 대적하고 모든 일을 행한 후에 서기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: Therefore put on the full armor of God
so that when the day of evil comes
you may be able to stand your ground
and after you have done everything
